name: 31000Lumen LED Work Light 260w with Tripod Stand Work Lights 5 Head Portable Work Light with Anti-Glare Lenses,19.7ft Power Cord, Height Adjustable, IP66 for Job Site, Garage, Outdoor Use
short_description: Super Bright LED Work Lights：260W LED tripod work light delivers intense illumination through five integrated lamp heads (30W x2, 50W x2, 100W x1), producing a concentrated 6500K natural white beam. With an impressive total output of 31,000 lumens, it replaces traditional halogen lights with much higher brightness and significantly lower power consumption. Whether you're working on automotive repairs, interior remodeling, or night construction, this setup ensures wide and stable coverage to boost safety and work efficiency.

High-Transparency Optical Lenses：Each light head features a high-transparency optical lens for focused, even illumination with reduced glare and enhanced visibility. The durable, impact-resistant lenses maintain clarity without yellowing or distortion even after long-term heavy use.

Detachable Top Three Light Heads：The top three light heads (two 50W and one 100W) can be detached together as a unit for flexible positioning. The two smaller 30W heads remain fixed and are not designed for independent use. This design offers versatile lighting arrangements to meet various task requirements.

Adjustable Height with Telescopic Tripod：The tripod stand extends up to 82.6 inches (210cm) and folds down for easy transport and storage. Its flexible height adjustment lets you adapt to different working scenarios, from close-up repairs to wide-area illumination. Made of durable iron for excellent strength and stability, it’s built to withstand rugged job sites and outdoor environments.

Tool-Free Adjustment with Multi-Directional Rotation：Adjust each light head easily without any tools—just rotate the locking knobs or twist collars by hand. The lights support 360° horizontal rotation and 180° vertical upward tilt, allowing precise aiming of the beam without moving the entire fixture.

Long Power Cord for Greater Reach：The 19.7ft (6m) power cord offers an extended working radius, minimizing reliance on extension cords. Ideal for large workspaces, outdoor construction, garages, home renovation projects, warehouses, and other scenarios where power outlets may be far away.

Weather-Resistant & Durable Construction：With IP66 waterproof housing and sealed joints, the light resists rain, dust, and job site wear. Reinforced aluminum housing protects internal components under tough conditions. Perfect for construction zones, warehouses, outdoor work, or emergencies.
